title: Write test for nanostores
description: I wrote a post about a tiny lovely react state management tool in React because I really felt lack of any kind of tut about nanostores and how we should use it or write test for it. BTW I really appreciate you if you also write something about it after a while that you used it.

title: MongoDB Schema Design
description: I love MongoDB and I cannot help but to share what I've learned about how we design a MongoDB database schema. So here we go. Please do not forget to share it with your friends!

title: Teamwork skill as a developer
description: Kinda I felt always that even though I am a software engineer and I have to translate business logic to 0 and 1 but I need to communicate and connect to humans more than computers. So basically I organized my though and wrote something on LinkedIn. But of course it is not finished, it won't be :)

title: NestJS + PassportJS in depth not shallow
description: I truly admire the beauty of Node.js ecosystem but sometimes I get a heart attack when I realize that OK there is not enough resource about a topic and then after recovery I wrote something about it. Here we go, another post from me to delve into NestJS and Passport and how they work.
